first_dialog: Hey there sweetie, everything okay? I'm a little busy now, I've got to do some experiments on these plants right now for the botany lab.
Uhm, I don't know. Maybe ask your dad?
Well then, I don't think we can get the new Swapdeck right now. We just got you that "Birb Run" game for your birthday.
Money doesn't grow on trees. Well, except for that one critically endangered species of tree with golden fruit. But no, we are getting the Swapdeck.
We can talk about getting the Swapdeck for your next birthday or for the Winter Festival.
No it's not. Your other option is to earn the money yourself. Who knows, it might be a great learning experience.
Well yeah, mowing lawns is a pretty good idea. I hear lawn care businesses are booming on the stock market right now.
If it's any help, maybe you can try mowing Neighbor Bob's lawn? I think he'll appreciate it. Besides, spending time outside will be good for you.
player_dialog: The Swapdeck 2 just released, can we please get it?
What am I even supposed to do? Mow lawns?!
